task.title: Enable a Login Using a Twitter Account
task.shortdesc: Connect your Twitter account to Livefyre to allow users to use their Twitter logins to interact with Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable login using a Twitter account:

step.cmd: Switch the Enable Login with Twitter toggle to ON.
Add your Twitter app’s Consumer Key (API Key) and Consumer Secret (API Secret).
step.info: These values are listed in your Twitter app’s Keys and Access Tokens page, available from https://apps.twitter.com/.
